name: starshipshop
description: A Star wars starships e-commerce project
author: Skrollu

scripts.backend-unit-test: npm run backend-dev-package && cd backend && mvn test
scripts.backend-integration-test: npm run backend-dev-package && cd backend && mvn verify
scripts.check-sonarqube: echo /!\ Be sure to run the sonarqube docker container following the guide in README.md /!\  && cd backend && mvn verify sonar:sonar -Dsonar.qualitygate.wait=true
scripts.docker-start-sonarqube: docker run -d --rm --name sonarqube -p 9000:9000 -v sonarqube_data:/opt/sonarqube/data -v sonarqube_extensions:/opt/sonarqube/extensions -v sonarqube_logs:/opt/sonarqube/logs sonarqube
